verses.verse: וַיִּקָּבְצ֧וּ <S%H6908><s%> gathered כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Then all Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> themselves to David חֶבְר֣וֹנָה <S%H2275><s%> unto Hebron לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עַצְמְךָ֥ <S%H6106><s%> Behold we [are] thy bone וּֽבְשָׂרְךָ֖ <S%H1320><s%> and thy flesh אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H587><s%> we

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> over my people תְּמ֣וֹל <S%H8543><s%> And moreover in time גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even שִׁלְשׁ֗וֹם <S%H8032><s%> past גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> even בִּהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> even when Saul מֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> was king אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> who הַמּוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> thou [wast] he that leddest out וְהַמֵּבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> and broughtest in אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְךָ֗ אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> You תִרְעֶ֤ה <S%H7462><s%> unto thee Thou shalt feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> my people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become נָגִ֔יד <S%H5057><s%> and thou shalt be ruler עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> Therefore came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זִקְנֵ֨י <S%H2205><s%> all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> to the king חֶבְר֔וֹנָה <S%H2275><s%> to Hebron וַיִּכְרֹת֩ <S%H3772><s%> made לָהֶ֨ם דָּוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> and David בְּרִ֛ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant בְּחֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> with them in Hebron לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיִּמְשְׁח֨וּ <S%H4886><s%> and they anointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> David לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H8050><s%> Samuel ס

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went דָּוִ֧יד <S%H1732><s%> And David וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> he יְב֑וּס <S%H2982><s%> which [is] Jebus וְשָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there הַיְבוּסִ֔י <S%H2983><s%> where the Jebusites יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> [were] the inhabitants הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <S%H559><s%> said יֹשְׁבֵ֤י <S%H3427><s%> And the inhabitants יְבוּס֙ <S%H2982><s%> of Jebus לְדָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> to David לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> Thou shalt not come הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here וַיִּלְכֹּ֤ד <S%H3920><s%> took דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> hither Nevertheless David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְצֻדַ֣ת <S%H4686><s%> the castle צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> which [is] the city דָּוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> And David כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Whoever מַכֵּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> Whosoever smiteth יְבוּסִי֙ <S%H2983><s%> the Jebusites בָּרִ֣אשׁוֹנָ֔ה <S%H7223><s%> first יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> became לְרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> shall be chief וּלְשָׂ֑ר <S%H8269><s%> and captain וַיַּ֧עַל <S%H5927><s%> up בָּרִאשׁוֹנָ֛ה <S%H7223><s%> first יוֹאָ֥ב <S%H3097><s%> So Joab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְרוּיָ֖ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> became לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> and was chief

וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> And David בַּמְצָ֑ד <S%H4679><s%> in the castle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> it was קָרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> therefore they called ל֖וֹ עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> it the city דָּוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David

וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> And he built הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> the city מִסָּבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> round about מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמִּלּ֖וֹא <S%H4407><s%> even from Millo וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַסָּבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וְיוֹאָ֕ב <S%H3097><s%> and Joab יְחַיֶּ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> repaired אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁאָ֥ר <S%H7605><s%> the rest הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> of the city

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> greater דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> So David הָל֣וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> greater וְגָד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and greater וַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with פ

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these רָאשֵׁ֤י <S%H7218><s%> These also [are] the chief הַגִּבּוֹרִים֙ <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom לְדָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> whom David הַמִּתְחַזְּקִ֨ים <S%H2388><s%> had who strengthened עִמּ֧וֹ <S%H5973><s%> together בְמַלְכוּת֛וֹ <S%H4438><s%> themselves with him in his kingdom עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> together כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> [and] with all Israel לְהַמְלִיכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> to make him king כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> concerning Israel ס

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מִסְפַּ֥ר <S%H4557><s%> And this [is] the number הַגִּבֹּרִ֖ים <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom לְדָוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> whom David יָשָׁבְעָ֣ם <S%H3434><s%> had Jashobeam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חַכְמוֹנִ֗י <S%H2453><s%> an Hachmonite רֹ֚אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the chief [הַשְּׁלֹושִׁים כ] (הַשָּׁ֣לִישִׁ֔ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty ק) הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he עוֹרֵ֧ר <S%H5782><s%> he lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲנִית֛וֹ <S%H2595><s%> his spear עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against שְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> against three מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred חָלָ֖ל <S%H2491><s%> slain בְּפַ֥עַם <S%H6471><s%> time אֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> [by him] at one

וְאַחֲרָ֛יו <S%H310><s%> And after אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <S%H499><s%> him [was] Eleazar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son דּוֹד֖וֹ <S%H1734><s%> of Dodo הָאֲחוֹחִ֑י <S%H266><s%> the Ahohite ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> who בִּשְׁלוֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> who [was one] of the three הַגִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <S%H1368><s%> mighties

הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> was with דָּוִ֜יד <S%H1732><s%> He was with David בַּפַּ֣ס דַּמִּ֗ים <S%H6450><s%> at Pasdammim וְהַפְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> and there the Philistines נֶאֱסְפוּ־ <S%H622><s%> were gathered together שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle וַתְּהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> and there was חֶלְקַ֥ת <S%H2513><s%> where was a parcel הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of ground מְלֵאָ֣ה <S%H4392><s%> full שְׂעוֹרִ֑ים <S%H8184><s%> of barley וְהָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people נָ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> fled מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from before פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines

וַיִּֽתְיַצְּב֤וּ <S%H3320><s%> And they set בְתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> themselves in the midst הַחֶלְקָה֙ <S%H2513><s%> of [that] parcel וַיַּצִּיל֔וּהָ <S%H5337><s%> and delivered וַיַּכּ֖וּ <S%H5221><s%> it and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines וַיּ֥וֹשַׁע <S%H3467><s%> saved יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֥ה <S%H8668><s%> deliverance גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> [them] by a great

וַיֵּרְד֡וּ <S%H3381><s%> went down שְֽׁלוֹשָׁה֩ <S%H7969><s%> Now three מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַשְּׁלוֹשִׁ֨ים <S%H7970><s%> of the thirty רֹ֤אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> captains עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הַצֻּר֙ <S%H6697><s%> to the rock אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> to David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into מְעָרַ֖ת <S%H4631><s%> into the cave עֲדֻלָּ֑ם <S%H5725><s%> of Adullam וּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> and the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines חֹנָ֖ה <S%H2583><s%> encamped בְּעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <S%H7497><s%> of Rephaim

וְדָוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> And David אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> was then בַּמְּצוּדָ֑ה <S%H4686><s%> [was] then in the hold וּנְצִ֣יב <S%H5333><s%> garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines' אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> then בְּבֵ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> [was] then at Bethlehem

[וַיִּתְאָו כ] (וַיִּתְאָ֥יו <S%H183><s%> desire ק) דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> And David וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said מִ֚י <S%H4310><s%> Oh יַשְׁקֵ֣נִי <S%H8248><s%> Oh that one would give me drink מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> of the water מִבּ֥וֹר <S%H953><s%> of the well בֵּֽית־ לֶ֖חֶם <S%H1035><s%> of Bethlehem אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ <S%H8179><s%> that [is] at the gate

וַיִּבְקְע֨וּ <S%H1234><s%> brake through הַשְּׁלֹשָׁ֜ה <S%H7969><s%> And the three בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַיִּֽשְׁאֲבוּ־ <S%H7579><s%> and drew מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> water מִבּ֤וֹר <S%H953><s%> out of the well בֵּֽית־ לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H1035><s%> of Bethlehem אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> that [was] by the gate וַיִּשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> and took וַיָּבִ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> [it] and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> [it] to David וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָבָ֤ה <S%H14><s%> would דָוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> but David לִשְׁתּוֹתָ֔ם <S%H8354><s%> not drink וַיְנַסֵּ֥ךְ <S%H5258><s%> [of] it but poured it out אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said חָלִילָה֩ <S%H2486><s%> forbid לִּ֨י מֵאֱלֹהַ֜י <S%H430><s%> My God מֵעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> it me that I should do זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> this thing הֲדַ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood הָאֲנָשִׁים֩ <S%H582><s%> of these men הָאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these אֶשְׁתֶּ֤ה <S%H8354><s%> shall I drink בְנַפְשׁוֹתָם֙ <S%H5315><s%> any כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בְנַפְשׁוֹתָ֣ם <S%H5315><s%> they הֱבִיא֔וּם <S%H935><s%> they brought וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אָבָ֖ה <S%H14><s%> it Therefore he would לִשְׁתּוֹתָ֑ם <S%H8354><s%> not drink אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These עָשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> it These things did שְׁלֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> these three הַגִּבּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H1368><s%> mightiest

וְאַבְשַׁ֣י <S%H52><s%> And Abishai אֲחִֽי־ <S%H251><s%> the brother יוֹאָ֗ב <S%H3097><s%> of Joab ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> he was chief הַשְּׁלוֹשָׁ֔ה <S%H7969><s%> of the three וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> and he עוֹרֵ֣ר <S%H5782><s%> for lifting up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲנִית֔וֹ <S%H2595><s%> his spear עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> against three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred חָלָ֑ל <S%H2490><s%> begin [וְלֹא־ כ] (וְלֹו־ <S%H3808><s%> had a שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> [them] and had a name ק) בַּשְּׁלוֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> among the three

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַשְּׁלוֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> Of the three בַשְּׁנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> than the two נִכְבָּ֔ד <S%H3513><s%> he was more honourable וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> and became לָהֶ֖ם לְשָׂ֑ר <S%H8269><s%> for he was their captain וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַשְּׁלוֹשָׁ֖ה <S%H7969><s%> not to the [first] three לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not בָֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> howbeit he attained ס
